node.detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，無外遊記錄，為第 #1424 宗個案患者的丈夫，與妻子居慈正邨正康樓，7 月 5 日開始咳嗽及發燒，曾到私家診所求診，之後再到伊利沙伯醫院急症室求診。平常多到慈雲山中心及慈雲山街市，曾到慈雲山中心百匯軒及 6 樓的茶餐廳。
node.detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and no recent travel history. He is the husband of patient #1424 and lives with his wife in Tsz Ching Estate Ching Hong House, Tsz Wan Shan. He started coughing on July 5 and went to a private clinic for consultation. He then went to the Nurse Quarter, Queen Elizabeth Hospital for consultation. He often goes to Tsz Wan Shan Shopping Centre and Tsz Wan Shan Market and had also recently been to the Deluxe Cuisine Restaurant in Tsz Wan Shan Shopping Centre and the local cha caan teng restaurant on the 6th floor.

groups.name_en:
Tsz Wan Shan Shopping
Centre Deluxe Cuisine
groups.description_zh: 慈雲山中心 7 樓百匯軒酒樓有員工及食客確診。
groups.description_en: Employees and guests of the restaurant Deluxe Cuisine on the 7th floor of Tsz Wan Shan Shopping Centre have tested positive.
